story_15_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Guess this is the end of the road for
our little team.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
And it was me who bugged you about teaming up
in the first place, wasn’t it? Sorry about that.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It’s fine. All par for the course...
Game aficionados like myself are used to
diving into competitions on a whim.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Besides, I think I know what your
true aim is here, anyway.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: It’s a pain in the neck, but I can’t let this slide.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I know there’s something lurking beneath the
surface with that Team Break gang.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I can’t nap in peace until I find out what that
something is.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You think the kid’s the best way to get to the
bottom of it, huh?
story_15_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’ll admit, [Name:PlayerNickname ] does have
a way of drawing out the passion in others.
A born leader.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I mean, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ]’d have to be if [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] managed to
impassion a jaded guy like me.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That’s reason enough to make [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] a target...
So you decided to follow along to protect [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]
and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] team. That’s what this is all about?
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Heh, you can think what you want.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Well, why don’t you just do what you want
and let me do the same.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Who knows? The next time we meet, we might
be fighting on opposing teams.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Cut me some slack here. I wouldn’t stand a
chance against you.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
But if you’re gonna find yourself another
teammate, you might want somebody that uses
a different type Pokémon than you.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Hmph. I still can’t tell what’s going on in that
head of yours.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: I think it’s time I took my leave...
story_15_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: Oh, before you go, I forgot to tell you.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: Let’s get some Sushi High Roller. My treat.
story_15_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: I’ll think about it, old man.
